game.name: Train Simulator: Amtrak Acela Express EMU Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Acela Express hauls North America’s famous Amtrak high speed rail service between Washington D.C. and New york City.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Acela Express hauls North America’s famous Amtrak high speed rail service between Washington D.C. and New york City.
